page.title: 18WHAT WE WOULD LIKE
page.content: In{Hoylandswaine}there are very few places for the people to use. Some of us asked around the{village}to see what people would like. This is what they told us. We would like a chip shop,Newsagents,Grocers,Bakers,Market, D.I.Y shop,Butchers,Joke shop and a Tailor.The nearest shopping centre is {Penistone}which is three miles away.In Hoylandswaine we only have a small {village store}and a small{Post Office. We would like a{Sports Centre.}In it we would like a swimming pool,a fun pool, ice skating rink,roller skating rink, tenis court,football pitch, gymnasium and an adventure playground. The{buses}only run every hour and we would like them more frequently. Our bus stop is only little but we do have a bus shelter.
